おしゃべりはどうですか？
google_translated:
While watching the stars
How about talking?

en_text: Give us a break already!
jp_text: じゃあ 鬼ごっこがいい人！
google_translated: Well then there is a good person!

en_text: But that would just be boring!
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）だって そんなの
つまんないもん！

en_text: Koizumi-kun, you'll play tag with me, right?
jp_text: 古泉君は鬼ごっこ派よね？
google_translated: Koizumi-kun is a demon girl, right?

en_text: Of course.
jp_text:
（キョン）ん？
（古泉）ハハハ…　もちろんです

en_text: Alright, Mikuru-chan! Quick, start running!
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）じゃあ みくるちゃん
早く逃げて！
google_translated:
Well then Mikuru-chan
Run away early!

en_text: Mikuru Dash!
jp_text:
（鶴屋）みくる ダッシュ！
（みくる）ふ… ふえ～

en_text: No, it's just...
jp_text: （キョン）ん…

en_text: It feels like I could touch them,\Neven though they're untouchable.
jp_text: 触れそうで 触れないなって…
google_translated: I'm going to touch it and I can't touch me ...

en_text: Let's go.
jp_text: 行こう

en_text: Training camp, complete.
jp_text: （長門）合宿終了

en_text: Be that as it may, once the rainy season lets up, it'll be summer break.
jp_text:
（朝倉）とはいえ
梅雨が明けたら夏休みですよ
google_translated: It is summer vacation if the rainy season is over

en_text: Have you made your plans?
jp_text: ちゃんと考えてますか？

en_text: Plans? For what?
jp_text: （長門）考える？　何を？

en_text: So, you'll have to think up\Nsome excuses to run into him.
jp_text:
だから キョン君に会う口実を
考えないと
google_translated:
So you meet you to meet you
I do not think

en_text: But, what kind of–...
jp_text: （長門）そっか　でも どんな…

en_text: Anything at all!
jp_text: （朝倉）何でもいいですよ

en_text: Like, "It's hot, let's go to the pool",
jp_text:
“暑いからプールに行こう”とか
“花火 みんなでしよう”とか
google_translated:
"Let's go to the pool because it is hot"
"Let's all the fireworks"

en_text: I see!
jp_text: （長門）なるほど…

en_text: It's only been half a year since you met Kyon-kun.
jp_text: キョン君と会って まだ半年
google_translated: I met Keong-kun yet half a year

en_text: There should still be plenty of things\Nyou haven't done yet, right?
jp_text:
意外に まだしてないこと
いっぱいあるでしょ？
google_translated:
What I have not yet done
Is there a lot?

en_text: There's a special sale today,\Nso I'm heading to the store.
jp_text:
今日は特売日だから
買い物してきますね
google_translated:
Because it is a sales day today
I will shop

en_text: Next time: "Someday in the Rain"
jp_text: （長門）次回…
